summary: "The Last of Us Part II" is a popular 2020 video game for PlayStation 4. It's set four years after the first game and follows Ellie and Abby, two women in a post-apocalyptic U.S. seeking revenge. You play as both characters, fighting humans and zombies with guns, makeshift weapons, and stealth. The game looks amazing and has great sound, but some players didn't like the story. It's one of the most expensive games to make and is now also available on PlayStation 5. Despite some criticism, it won many awards and sold over 10 million copies by 2022.
title: The Last of Us Part II
